reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Agriturismo Marciano was our best ever experience in Italy. We stayed in a room called Gio for 6 nights in the beginning of May. It's a perfect base to travel through Tuscany.
reviews.title: A haven of peace in Siena

likes.liked: — The view from the room and the house, the calm and peaceful ambience, the kind staffs, the facilities at guests disposal
